name: Chilley's Basics In Puffles And Learning
name_original: Chilley's Basics In Puffles And Learning
description:
REMEMBER! This game is not educational at all! its a horror game and it contains jumpscares,loud noises and flashing lights!

(This is a Baldi's Basics Mod!)

Welcome to the epic Chilley's School!

You will learn a lot of math with Chilley! Dont answer any math question wrong, Chilley hates that!

Chilley has a lot of friends that will make your task more hard!

There's a lot of rules, but the most important rule is... Dont go to the Charlie's Office!

Thats it, enjoy learning with Chilley!

Thanks to @MartinTheBall2009 
for helping in some things of the mod Original Game: https://basically-games.itch.io/baldis-basics
